title: My fps dropped from 200 yesterday to 5 today
body:
after the new client update, my fps dropped from 200 to 5 in every game
any answears?

replies.body:
The Beta Client doesn't change anything after you've entered the game, afaik. so it's unlikely they're directly related. Your FPS is likely affected by a display driver or hardware issue, which are common causes. I'd strongly recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the most common fixes.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
